issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: If a stack is created with a network interface, and the network interface is unable to be created (for example, if not in VPC mode), and the network interface doesn't set a physical resource id, the stack can not be deleted.
fields.summary: unable to delete stack if network interface id has a null physical resource id
